```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(stringr)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
```


```{r}
noaa = read.csv("data/3155275.csv")

noaa_df = noaa %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(date, starts_with("hourly")) %>% 
  mutate(
    date = str_replace_all(date, "T", "-")
  ) %>% 
  separate(date, c("year", "month", "day", "hour", "minute", "second")) %>% 
  filter(minute == "51") 
```
